column2: "Everyone, thanks for coming out today! Let's sing that special song! Listen and dance, and get pumped!"
"Even in the cold, this song will be sure to keep you warm! Don't miss it! [Endless Story]!"
"Thank you for listening! It made me feel really good! How about you? Aren't you all feeling great?"

"If my song managed to lift your spirits, I'm so glad!
It's because of you ARKS that we could come together today, so thank you!"
"See you later, everyone!"
"Closing your eyes so that you can hear... hear the best inside your ears."
"Your hand reaching out there... to take hold of your courage!"
"Everyone's heading towards tomorrow, continuing on the ongoing path."
"That starry sky we imagined is still so far away..."
"That irreplaceable smile, it lights up the darkness."
"Even when separated, its memory makes me shine!"
"Now, step forward and kick it to the wind... This endless story!"
"The foreseen future... it's up to you and your unrelenting passion."
"You're not alone! Each time you open your heart, you become stronger."
"The warmth of a connecting hand is like a guide, pushing you forward."
"Looking around and seeing no one... That's just the wind blowing."
"But I can definitely hear your voice!"
"The feelings that you hold dear, you protect them!"
"So, don't look backwards! Keep moving forward!"
"Now, your heart is starting to beat in rhythm to the unending story."
"This world is infinite. Let's explore it together!"
"Alone, the light they hold is small and weak."
"One by one they join together and become larger, brighter!"
"It takes just one step, and anyone can be a hero!"
"Raise your faces, your gazes... and cause a miracle!"
"Now, step forward and kick it to the wind... This endless story!"
"The foreseen future... it's up to you and your unrelenting passion."
"You're not alone! Each time you open your heart, you become stronger."
"The warmth of a connecting hand is like a guide, walking with you."
"Let's go to the place we dreamed of... to the world reflected in our eyes."
"The warmth that won't disappear... is like a guide, walking with you."
"Endless Story"
"Quna"
